title: Character portrait: it's been a little while

comments.author: Valento.9852
comments.body:
I was just scrolling API forums and thought “hey, how about I say hi”. So here it is: Hi!

/shamelessbump

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
I spent a couple of days working on it.

Let’s just say that I bumped my 1 month estimate to “3 months” ;__;

comments.author: Valento.9852
comments.body:
Hey, Lawton. I’d like to know if there’s any progress regarding this issue. I know there’s plenty of more important stuff going on, but it doesn’t hurt to ask.

Thanks.
